The '''Mounts of Mayhem: Challengers Tournament''', also referred to as the '''Mayhem Tournament''',<ref>{{mcnet|mounts-of-mayhem-challengers-tournament|Mounts of Mayhem: Challengers Tournament|October 29, 2025|Sofia Dankis|archive-url|archive-time|url-prefix}}</ref> the '''Mayhem Tournaments''', the '''Mounts of Mayhem challenge''',<ref>{{mcnet|mounts-of-mayhem-cave-arena|Mounts of Mayhem: Cave Arena|November 18, 2025|Sofia Dankis|archive-url|archive-time|url-prefix}}</ref> the '''chaotic challenges''',<ref>{{mcnet|mounts-of-mayhem-nether-arena|Mounts of Mayhem: Nether Arena|November 24, 2025|Sofia Dankis|archive-url|archive-time|url-prefix}}</ref> the '''Vanilla Arena''',<ref>{{mcnet|mounts-of-mayhem-finale-arena|Mounts of Mayhem: Finale Arena|December 3, 2025|Sofia Dankis|archive-url|archive-time|url-prefix}}</ref> and the '''Arena series''',<ref>{{citation|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/updates/mounts-of-mayhem-drop|title=Mounts of Mayhem: Minecraft Game Drop 4 (2025)|section=Arena series|website=[[Minecraft.net]]|author=[[Mojang Studios]]|date=December 9, 2025|quote=Charge your enemies with the spear from horseback!|archive-url=}}</ref> is a series of articles on [[Minecraft.net]] written to promote the [[Mounts of Mayhem]] drop.
